content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Abbasi. I'm sure you will find it quite comfortable and convenient, given its location in the city center. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I believe that the location of your apartment is quite advantageous, as it is close to all important facilities. However, I am a student and I am looking for a place that offers a good value for my budget. I am prepared to pay a fair price, but I do hope we can negotiate a rate that is both reasonable and affordable for me. Could you please tell me your initial asking price for the rent?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I understand that finding a balance between a fair price and affordability is important. While I cannot disclose my initial asking price, I am willing to negotiate to find a rate that is acceptable to both parties. Would you be able to offer a price that you think is fair for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I am on a tight budget, and I am looking for a place that not only meets my needs but also fits within my financial constraints. I am prepared to pay a price that reflects the value of the apartment, considering its location and amenities. I would like to propose a monthly rent of 800 Euros. Is this within your range of consideration?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your proposal of 800 Euros per month is a good starting point, Mr. Abbasi. However, given the prime location and the fact that the apartment is newly built, I was hoping for a price closer to 1000 Euros per month. This would be more in line with the market value for such properties in the city center. What do you think? Could you possibly reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your request for 1000 Euros per month is higher than what I had in mind. As a student, I am looking to strike a balance between quality and affordability. While the location is excellent, the apartment is unfurnished, which does affect the overall value. I believe 800 Euros is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center, especially for a student like me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at 850 Euros per month? This would be more in line with my budget and would still reflect the value of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your consideration for the unfurnished state of the apartment is noted, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate that students have specific budget constraints. Meeting halfway at 850 Euros per month is a fair compromise. I believe this reflects the value of the apartment and its location, while also taking into account your financial situation as a student. I am willing to accept this offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent, Mister Schmidt. I am pleased that we have reached an agreement. I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
